summary: A plumber parked his van and entered an apartment house. He took the elevator to the twelfth floor, where he was noticed by a person on the eleventh floor. The plumber, who was actually a detective, suspected one of his neighbors of being dishonest. Several recent incidents had occurred, including a missing necklace and a stolen coin collection. The detective was trying to understand what was happening in the apartment house.
quotes: there was something going on that he didn't understand
it had disappeared from her jewelry case
